item.title: Hugo
item.description: Get Started Create new site: 1 2 hugo new site <name> cd <name> Download required them into themes folder: You can choose to create git submodule or clone the theme 1 git clone/sub module http://theme-from-github into themes/<name> Update config.yaml to choose the downloaded theme. 1 theme:<name> Start hugo server: 1 hugo server Create Content All your site content resides in folder content/
